1.0.name: wordpress/science-breeze-widget
1.0.description:
Customizable widget which displays the latest technology post from science-breeze.com

Just Download and upload this plugin to your wordpress plugin directory and Active this,Add the widget to your sidebar from Appearance->Widgets and configure the widget options.

Check my other plugin

Stay tuned,and do your updates... Science Breeze Widget has Spirit!

Feature List

  • Displays a user-defined number of recent posts from bangla blog Science Breeze
  • Displays Science Breeze current featured post title with link
